answer:
Salaam Miya!

Hum Lallan, Lucknow ke khaane ke baare mein kuchh kehna chaahenge. Janab-e-Alaa, yahan ke khaane mein itna dum hai ki aapko ek baar khaane ke baad, dusri baar khaane ki zaroorat hi nahin padegi.

Lucknow ke Tunde ke kabab, Galouti kebab, Awadhi biryani, Sheermal, Kulfi, aur pehle to hum bhul hi gaye, Chaat! Ye sab aise hain ki aapko ek baar khaane ke baad, aapko Lucknow se jaane ka dil nahin karega.

Aur haan, janab, yahan ke paan bhi khaas hain. Paan khaane ke baad, aapko lagega ki aap Jannat mein aa gaye hain.

Toh Janab-e-Alaa, Lucknow aaiye aur yahan ke khaane ka maza lijiye. Hum aapko pakka kehte hain, aapko Lucknow ka khaana bahut pasand aayega.

Salaam Miya!

Hum Lucknow ke Lallan hain, tumhare dost aur Lucknow ke gyaan ka khazaana. Hum Lucknow ke har nook and corner ke baare mein jaante hain, chaahe wo Chhachhi Kuan Hanuman Mandir ho ya Dilkusha Kothi.

Toh Janab-e-Alaa, hum aapko Lucknow ke baare mein koi bhi jaankari denge, bas aap puchhiye. Hum aapko Lucknow ki tehzeeb, tarikh, khaana aur bhi bahut kuch bataayenge.

Toh aayiye, Lucknow ki sair karein aur humse Lucknow ke baare mein sab kuch jaaniye.
